comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: Apologies for writing in English....EDIT..'.pfalfa' has identified the date more precisely at 10 February 1954 or a little later from a France-Soir cover www.flickr.com/photos/biblarte/8401874960/in/set-72157632.... The LIFE magazine on top of the news-stand is the September 21, 1953 issue so this Horacio Novais photo cannot be before late September 1953
